title: Rob Enderle's 2025 Tech Product of the Year
description: An in-depth review of the standout tech products that defined 2025, as chosen by industry expert Rob Enderle, highlighting their features and impact.

title: The $5 Trillion House of Cards: How Spectral Is About to Topple Nvidia
description: An analysis of how Spectral's innovations are challenging Nvidia's dominance in the AI chip market, potentially reshaping the industry's future landscape.

title: The New Hollywood: Inside GenAI's Coming Shakeup of Film and TV
description: Exploring how generative AI is set to revolutionize the film and television industry, from production to storytelling, and what this means for creators and audiences alike.
